content: You'll then see an illustration of Wukong's life, starting with him fighting Erlang. As The Destined One is not shown inside the rock before the credits roll, it suggests that The Destined One was worthy all along and that the cycle begins anew.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Endings_Explained.md', within the main section titled 'Endings Explained', specifically from the subsection 'Ending 2 - The (True) Secret Ending'.
The content is as follows:
You'll then see an illustration of Wukong's life, starting with him fighting Erlang. As The Destined One is not shown inside the rock before the credits roll, it suggests that The Destined One was worthy all along and that the cycle begins anew.
